title.a: Update Major Emergency Brush Fire #HansenFire 03/13/2022 INC#1459

item.description: Update #HansenFire Major Emergency Brush Fire; INC#1459; 10:55PM; 10400 N Glenoaks Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3q1x65g; Hansen Dam; With 124 LAFD ground and air responders now joined by two LACoFD Hand Crews / Supervisors and one LACoFD Battalion Chief in Automatic Aid, this active wildfire known as the Hansen Fire, has escalated to Major Emergency status. The flames, still driven by 10 MPH wind, have consumed brush on two fronts, including 3 acres to the north side, and one-quarter (0.25) acre to the south near *but not involving* the golf course. There are NO injuries reported, NO structures currently threatened and NO formal evacuations.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 BP74 BP8 CM42 E103 E105 E108 E18 E239 E24 E274 E275 E287 E289 E290 E39 E61 E7 E70 E77 E89 E90 E91 E93 E97 EM15 H1 H2 H3 H5 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA5 RA7 RA77 RA828 T39 T74 T75 T87 T89 T90 WT77 WT88 + LACoFD BC4 SUP19 SUP21 C14-2 C19-2; CH5; 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Brush Fire #HansenFire 03/13/2022 INC#1459

item.description: Update #HansenFire Greater Alarm Brush Fire; INC#1459; 10:10PM; 10400 N Glenoaks Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3q1x65g; #HansenDam; With 95 LAFD ground and air responders joined by two LACoFD Hand Crews / Supervisors, this active wildfire incident has escalated to Greater Alarm status, and is formally known as the #HansenFire. No acreage update. There are NO injuries reported, NO structures currently threatened and NO formal evacuations.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 CM42 E103 E108 E18 E24 E274 E275 E287 E289 E39 E7 E70 E77 E89 E90 E97 EM15 H1 H2 H3 H5 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA5 RA7 RA77 T74 T75 T87 T89 WT77 WT88; CH5; 18; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1473; 09:42PM; 9629 N Sunland Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JaNcRQ; #ShadowHills; PRELIM: 2 vehicle collision with two persons trapped (one in each vehicle). No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #4013); FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 E102 E260 E60 E88 EM14 HR3 RA74 RA874 RA89 T60 UR88; CH8; 13; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1459; 09:33PM; 10400 N Glenoaks Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3q1x65g; #HansenDam; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to one-quarter (0.25) acre brush burning in the Hansen Dam Recreation Area, moving slowly east, fanned by 10 MPH winds. No structure threat. No evacuation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 BC10 BC12 E24 E274 E275 E289 E7 E77 E89 E90 EM15 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 HA3 RA7 RA77 T74 T75 T89 WT77; CH5; 18; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#0502; 09:56AM; Wonder View Trail; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vZs1OL; #HollywoodHills; LAFD ground and air response with Park Rangers to an adult male hiker with a severe head injury sustained in a fall on a narrow path near the Wonder View Trail. LAFD ground crews have hiked to the patient and are providing on-site medical care. A hovering LAFD rescue helicopter will soon hoist the patient aboard for in-flight care during immediate transport to a regional trauma center. ; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 BC5 E260 E76 H0F H1 H5 HA1 HA5 RA76 RH114 T60; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 03/12/2022 INC#0932

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0932; 02:08PM; 3669 W 9th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3I1rUEJ; #Koreatown; Address Corrected from St. Andrews. 102 LAFD Firefighters took just 18 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire within one second-floor unit of a 4 story modern senior living apartment building. The self evacuation of many residents was calmly underway on LAFD arrival, with some residents subsequently assisted to safely shelter in place under the supervision of LAFD responders. No injury has been reported. The cause of the fire is under active investigation.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 4; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC5 CM22 E11 E13 E211 E226 E227 E229 E235 E261 E289 E29 E34 E5 E61 EM1 EM11 EM13 EM14 HR3 RA29 RA35 RA6 RA61 RA66 RA826 T11 T26 T27 T29 T35 T61 T89 UR5 UR88; CH9; 14 15; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#0913; 01:43PM; 8401 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bXGNf4; #StudioCity; LAFD ground and air response to an adult female hiker who sustained an apparent ankle fracture in a ground level fall on or near the Fryman Canyon Trail. She is being treated and stabilized by first arriving LAFD ground crews who hiked to her location, and will soon be hoisted aboard a hovering LAFD rescue helicopter for continuing in-flight care during direct transport to an area hospital.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; AO1 BC14 E278 E89 H5 H6 HA5 HA6 RA97 RH114 T78; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0932; 01:50PM; 872 S St Andrews Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3J9OJYq; #Koreatown; Address Tentative. PRELIM: 4 story senior living apartment building with fire visible from one unit on the second floor. Self evacuation of some residents underway on LAFD arrival.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 4; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 CM22 E11 E13 E211 E226 E229 E235 E261 E289 E29 E34 E5 E61 EM11 EM13 EM14 HR3 RA29 RA35 RA6 RA61 RA66 RA826 T11 T26 T29 T35 T61 T89 UR5 UR88; CH9; 14 15; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0991; 03:09PM; 1838 W Manchester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w0KN8G; #GramercyPark; First arriving 50 LAFD FIrefighters took less than 20 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire involving a steel cargo container (impromptu retail?) alongside a 100' x 50' one-story commercial building. A bold offensive fire attack confined fire to the contents of the container, preventing direct fire damage to the adjacent structure that contained a nail salon. One adult male civilian (unknown site affiliation or circumstances) sustained serious burn injuries to both legs. He will soon be transported by LAFD Paramedics to an area hospital. No other injuries reported. The cause of the fire is under active investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 BC18 BC4 CM22 CM32 E21 E221 E229 E233 E266 E285 E295 E34 E5 E57 E66 EM11 HR3 RA266 RA66 RA857 T21 T29 T33 T66 T85 T95 UR5 UR88; CH9; 14 15; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0991; 02:49PM; 1838 W Manchester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w0KN8G; #GramercyPark; PRELIM: One story commercial building with fire showing (from a nail salon?); FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E221 E229 E233 E34 E57 E66 RA66 RA857 T21 T29 T33; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey
